item.title: What encryption mining algorithm is ethereum mined on?
item.description:
What encryption mining algorithm is ethereum mined on?

Answer: Hi Justin, I still getting up to speed on Ethereum, but found this: "Ethereum's proof-of-work algorithm is called Ethash. The Ethereum developers claim that this algorithm is memory hard, which makes it ASIC resistant." Source: Ethereum (Ether) Mining

item.title: Is Bitcoin a public blockchain versus Ethereum being a private blockchain?
item.description:
Is Bitcoin a public blockchain versus Ethereum being a private blockchain?

Answer: No. A blockchain is a decentral database that stores transactions in the sense of a public ledger. That means everybody is invited to download and work with that information to proove that any transaction on it is mathematically valid. Bitcoin and Etherum are most well known services, tha...

item.title: Vermont passes legislation to recognize documentation notarized by blockchain

Vermont passes legislation to recognize documentation notarized by blockchain

item.title: Six Bitcoin Mines Related to Criminal Ring Seized by Spanish Police
item.description:
Six Bitcoin Mines Related to Criminal Ring Seized by Spanish Police

Spanish police have seized six bitcoin mines that were allegedly in use by a criminal network involved in the illegal distribution of pay-TV channels in Spain. A joint investigation by the Spanish National Police and Tax Authorities with the support of Europol and local German police saw the crackdown of a criminal network making proceeds from the illegal distribution of pay-TV channels in Spain, reported.

item.title: Russia's National Settlement Depository Successfully Tests Blockchain-Based E-Voting System
item.description:
Russia's National Settlement Depository Successfully Tests Blockchain-Based E-Voting System

The National Settlement Depository (NSD), Russia's central securities depository, has developed and successfully tested an e-proxy voting system running on a distributed ledger built with the NXT distributed cryptographic platform. The project's open-source code is available on GitHub. The NSD, a member of the Moscow Exchange, is a Russian nonbanking credit organization, Russia's central depository and a professional securities market player.

item.title: Deloitte Building Irish Blockchain Lab with 50 Developers - CoinDesk
item.description:
Deloitte Building Irish Blockchain Lab with 50 Developers - CoinDesk

Deloitte is set to rapidly scale its global plans for blockchain services by setting up a new development hub in Ireland. Announced today, Deloitte has created a financial services blockchain lab in Dublin, and will seek to grow that team to 50 people over the next 18 months.

item.title: I just single-handedly increased Bitcoin network capacity by 0.05% today. * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
I just single-handedly increased Bitcoin network capacity by 0.05% today. * /r/Bitcoin

Bitcoin is the currency of the Internet: a distributed, worldwide, decentralized digital money. Unlike traditional currencies such as dollars, bitcoins are issued and managed without any central authority whatsoever: there is no government, company, or bank in charge of Bitcoin. As such, it is more resistant to wild inflation and corrupt banks.
